channel.title: Error =/
channel.description:
Ok.. earlier today I couldn't get the program to work, and now I finally get it working. I log in, get the items I need, put on red phat, d chain, rune boots, and d legs, then try to put infinity gloves on, and they go into my sword position, then I get disconnected and then logged in again. Once again I try and put them on, and then I get disconnected and the program restarts, anyways I was pissed and punched my desk, so is there any way I can fix it
OK, I found now I cannot put on more than 4 items or I get screwed up. Anyone got an idea?[br][size=1]Posted on: September 11, 2007, 05:02:38 PM[/size][hr]Omg why won't anyone help me...

item.title: Error =/
item.dc:creator: @lawlpwned lawlpwned
item.description:
@lawlpwned wrote:

On another topic

Because it is simple. You need to add it to your equip’d intergers in your item class.

So… how do you do that? I’m a n00b to this stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Error =/
item.dc:creator: @vincentiscoolftw vincentiscoolftw
item.description:
@vincentiscoolftw wrote:

go to item.java, and put the infinity gloves id in the public static int gloves[] = section

Read full topic
